description:
Midon the fisherman is wounded and can`t go fishing.  He borrows money from a samurai, but can`t pay it back. A wife gets mad at her drunkard husband and returns to her parents.  But she misses her husband now that she`s left him. A young servant named Sutekichi loves katanas.  He wants his own, so he pays a blacksmith with a thousand logs to make one for him.
Source: crunchyroll
